title: Where to watch Super Bowl 2026 in Boston: 7 must-visit sports bars
author: Kevin Slane and Autumn Sloboda
bullets: Banners Kitchen & Tap will show Super Bowl LX on a 40-foot screen with ticketed seating and bottomless wings packages.
Tony C's offers multiple locations with numerous large TVs for viewing Super Bowl LX, including Somerville and Burlington.
Parlor Sports in Somerville offers a cozy atmosphere with a dozen TVs and a wide selection of beers for game watching.

title: Four charged in $1M SNAP, unemployment fraud scheme tied to Leominster restaurant
author: Samantha Genzer
bullets: Four individuals charged in a $1 million fraud scheme using stolen identities for SNAP and unemployment benefits.
Raul Fernandez Vicioso, linked to Leominster's El Primo Restaurant, allegedly used fraudulent EBT cards for food and cash funneling.
Investigators found fraudulent documents and more than 100 stolen identities at Vicioso's home and the restaurant.

title: Local obituary: Jaylin Rainford, 20, Catholic Memorial grad and Bryant University junior
author: Boston.com Staff
bullets: Jaylin Rainford, 20, Catholic Memorial graduate and Bryant University junior, passed away on January 25, 2026.
Rainford was majoring in finance at Bryant University and was known for his intelligence and deep faith.
Funeral services for Jaylin Rainford will be held in Randolph, Massachusetts on February 6th and 7th.

title: Drake Maye says he got Super Bowl schedule advice from a former Patriots rival
author: Hayden Bird
bullets: Drake Maye received Super Bowl advice from Peyton Manning, focusing on maintaining a consistent schedule despite the challenges.
Maye, a Patriots quarterback, reminisced about attending Super Bowl 50 when Manning's Broncos defeated the Panthers 24-10.
The advice came ahead of the Patriots' upcoming matchup against the Seahawks in Super Bowl LX at Levi's Stadium.

title: Here’s what to expect these remaining weeks of winter, according to Dave Epstein
author: David Epstein
bullets: New England expected to see colder-than-average temperatures into early March, with a temporary warm-up in late February.
February snow in Boston could reach or exceed the 13-inch average, following a snowy January with significant cold conditions.
While temperatures remain cold, daylight is increasing, gaining over an hour in February and more in March, hinting at spring.

title: Kayshon Boutte gives a blunt reason for his breakout season
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Kayshon Boutte credits his breakout season to quarterback Drake Maye's performance for the New England Patriots.
Boutte recorded 551 yards and six touchdowns despite injuries, averaging 17 yards per catch, tying third in the NFL.
Boutte leads the team in postseason receiving yards with 147 on eight catches, including a notable one-handed touchdown.

title: Joe Milton says he felt ‘disrespected’ by Patriots, Jerod Mayo before trade
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Joe Milton played one season with the New England Patriots, completing a strong performance against the Bills in the final game.
Milton requested a trade to the Dallas Cowboys after feeling sidelined and underutilized behind Drake Maye in New England.
Milton expressed frustrations to Patriots coaches, feeling he demonstrated high ability but received limited playing opportunities.

title: Massachusetts native Josh D’Amaro chosen as Disney’s new CEO
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Josh D'Amaro, a Massachusetts native and former financial planner at Gillette, named CEO of Disney effective March 18.
D'Amaro has served as chairman of Disney Experiences since 2020, overseeing 12 theme parks and 57 resort hotels globally.
He succeeds Robert Iger after a multi-year succession process that evaluated both internal and external candidates.

title: Where does Marcus Jones rank among the best two-way players in Patriots history?
author: Colin McCarthy
bullets: Marcus Jones ranks third among the best two-way players in Patriots history due to his versatile roles and scoring ability.
In 2022, Jones played as a slot receiver and scored a touchdown; he then excelled as a punt returner and cornerback.
Mike Vrabel holds the top spot for Patriots' two-way players with 10 career receiving touchdowns and Pro Bowl linebacker status.

title: These are the best Cape Cod chips, according to readers
author: Katelyn Umholtz
bullets: 1,000 readers ranked the best Cape Cod chip flavors with Original being the favorite.
The Hyannis chip facility is set to close, ending Cape Cod chips' physical presence in Cape Cod.
Dark Russet and Sea Salt & Vinegar were also popular among the top-ranked flavors.
